languages.text: "Сознаетесь в своих грехах и просите покаяния у Лорд-инквизитора? Смело. Как я уже сказал, для искупления достаточно будет взять Ефрат-II. Но если вы действительно раскаиваетесь в своих деяниях и желаете смыть тот след, что они оставили на вашей душе, то я готов провести ритуал пурификации. Преклоните колено и выпейте это". {n}Лорд-инквизитор протягивает флягу.{/n} "До дна".

traits.locale_text: "Сознаетесь в своих грехах и просите покаяния у Лорд-инквизитора? Смело. Если вы действительно раскаиваетесь в своих деяниях и желаете смыть тот след, что они оставили на вашей душе, то я готов провести ритуал пурификации. Преклоните колено и выпейте это". {n}Лорд-инквизитор достает на удивление простую на вид флягу, откупоривает ее и протягивает вам.{/n} "До дна".

languages.text: "Are you confessing your transgressions before the Lord Inquisitor and seeking to repent? That is brave. As I said, all you have to do to redeem yourself is to take Eufrates II. But if you truly do repent of your deeds and seek to wash away the stain they have left upon your soul, I can perform a rite of purification. Bend your knee and drink this." {n}The Lord Inquisitor holds out a flask to you.{/n} "All of it."
languages.original_text: "Сознаетесь в своих грехах и просите покаяния у Лорд-инквизитора? Смело. Как я уже сказал, для искупления достаточно будет взять Ефрат-II. Но если вы действительно раскаиваетесь в своих деяниях и желаете смыть тот след, что они оставили на вашей душе, то я готов провести ритуал пурификации. Преклоните колено и выпейте это". {n}Лорд-инквизитор протягивает флягу.{/n} "До дна".

traits.locale_text: "You're confessing your sins before the Lord Inquisitor and seeking to repent? That's brave. As I said, all you have to do to redeem yourself is take Eufrates II. But if you really do repent of your deeds and seek to wash away the mark they've left upon your soul, I can perform a rite of purification. Bend your knee and drink this." {n}The Lord Inquisitor holds out a flask to you.{/n} "All of it."

"You're confessing your sins before the Lord Inquisitor and seeking to repent? That's brave. As I said, all you have to do to redeem yourself is take Eufrates II. But if you really do repent of your deeds and seek to wash away the mark they've left upon your soul, I can perform a rite of purification. Bend your knee and drink this." {n}The Lord Inquisitor holds out a flask to you.{/n} "All of it."

"Are you confessing your transgressions before the Lord Inquisitor and seeking to repent? That is brave. As I said, all you have to do to redeem yourself is to take Eufrates II. But if you truly do repent of your deeds and seek to wash away the stain they have left upon your soul, I can perform a rite of purification. Bend your knee and drink this." {n}The Lord Inquisitor holds out a flask to you.{/n} "All of it."

languages.text: “你是在大审判官面前承认自己的罪过，寻求忏悔吗？你的行为很勇敢。我曾说过，你只要攻下欧夫拉茨二号星，就相当于将功赎罪了。不过，如果你真的打算对自己的行为忏悔，想洗去腐化在你灵魂上留下的污点的话，我可以为你举行净化仪式。跪在地上，把这些东西喝掉。”{n}大审判官朝你递过来一个水壶。{/n}“全部喝掉。”
languages.original_text: "Are you confessing your transgressions before the Lord Inquisitor and seeking to repent? That is brave. As I said, all you have to do to redeem yourself is to take Eufrates II. But if you truly do repent of your deeds and seek to wash away the stain they have left upon your soul, I can perform a rite of purification. Bend your knee and drink this." {n}The Lord Inquisitor holds out a flask to you.{/n} "All of it."

traits.locale_text: “你是在审判长面前承认自己的罪过，寻求忏悔吗？你的行为很勇敢。我曾说过，你只要攻下欧夫拉茨二号星，就相当于将功赎罪了。不过，如果你真的打算对自己的行为忏悔，想洗去腐化在你灵魂上留下的印记的话，我可以为你举行净化仪式。跪在地上，把这些东西喝掉。”{n}审判长朝你递过来一个水壶。{/n}“全部喝掉。”

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターの前で罪を認めることで悔い改めようとしているのか？勇敢だな。言った通り、名誉挽回のためにはユーフラテス・IIを取るしかない。だが、本当に罪を悔い改めて魂の痕跡を洗い流すのなら、浄化の儀式を行う事もできる。跪き、これを飲み干せ」{n}そう言い、ロード・インクィジターが器を差し出す。{/n}「一滴残らずだ」
languages.original_text: "Are you confessing your transgressions before the Lord Inquisitor and seeking to repent? That is brave. As I said, all you have to do to redeem yourself is to take Eufrates II. But if you truly do repent of your deeds and seek to wash away the stain they have left upon your soul, I can perform a rite of purification. Bend your knee and drink this." {n}The Lord Inquisitor holds out a flask to you.{/n} "All of it."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターの前で罪を認めることで悔い改めようとしているのか？勇敢だな。言った通り、名誉挽回のためにはユーフラテス・IIを取るしかない。だが、本当に罪を悔い改めて魂の痕跡を洗い流すのなら、浄化の儀式を行う事もできる。跪き、これを飲み干せ」{n}そう言い、ロード・インクィジターが器を差し出す。{/n}「一滴残らずだ」

languages.text: «¿Confiesa sus transgresiones ante el Lord Inquisidor y busca arrepentirse? Qué valiente. Como ya dije, todo lo que tiene que hacer para redimirse es tomar Eufrates II, pero si realmente se arrepiente de sus actos y busca deshacerse de la marca que han dejado en su alma, puedo realizar una ceremonia de purificación. Arrodíllese y beba esto». {n}El Lord Inquisidor te acerca un frasco.{/n} «Todo».
languages.original_text: "Are you confessing your transgressions before the Lord Inquisitor and seeking to repent? That is brave. As I said, all you have to do to redeem yourself is to take Eufrates II. But if you truly do repent of your deeds and seek to wash away the stain they have left upon your soul, I can perform a rite of purification. Bend your knee and drink this." {n}The Lord Inquisitor holds out a flask to you.{/n} "All of it."

traits.locale_text: «¿Confiesa sus transgresiones ante el Lord Inquisidor y busca arrepentirse? Qué valiente. Como ya dije, todo lo que tiene que hacer para redimirse es tomar Eufrates II, pero si realmente se arrepiente de sus actos y busca deshacerse de la marca que han dejado en su alma, puedo realizar una ceremonia de purificación. Arrodíllese y beba esto». {n}El Lord Inquisidor te acerca un frasco.{/n} «Todo».

languages.text: "Gesteht Ihr Eure Sünden vor dem Großinquisitor und wollt Ihr bereuen? Das ist mutig. Wie gesagt, um Erlösung zu erlangen, müsst Ihr lediglich Eufrates II einnehmen. Wenn Ihr Eure Taten aber wirklich bereut und das Mal fortwaschen wollt, das sie auf Eurer Seele hinterlassen haben, kann ich einen Ritus der Läuterung durchführen. Beugt das Knie und trinkt das." {n}Der Großinquisitor hält dir eine Flasche hin.{/n} "Alles."
languages.original_text: "Are you confessing your transgressions before the Lord Inquisitor and seeking to repent? That is brave. As I said, all you have to do to redeem yourself is to take Eufrates II. But if you truly do repent of your deeds and seek to wash away the stain they have left upon your soul, I can perform a rite of purification. Bend your knee and drink this." {n}The Lord Inquisitor holds out a flask to you.{/n} "All of it."

traits.locale_text: "Gesteht Ihr Eure Sünden vor dem Großinquisitor und wollt Ihr bereuen? Das ist mutig. Wie gesagt, um Erlösung zu erlangen, müsst Ihr lediglich Eufrates II einnehmen. Wenn Ihr Eure Taten aber wirklich bereut und das Mal fortwaschen wollt, das sie auf Eurer Seele hinterlassen haben, kann ich einen Ritus der Läuterung durchführen. Beugt das Knie und trinkt das." {n}Der Großinquisitor hält dir eine Flasche hin.{/n} "Alles."

languages.text: « Ainsi, vous confessez vos transgressions au seigneur inquisiteur et cherchez à vous repentir ? Vous ne manquez pas de courage. Comme je vous l'ai déjà dit, tout ce que vous avez à faire pour expier vos fautes, c'est vous rendre sur Euphrate-II. Cependant, si vous souhaitez véritablement purger votre âme de la moindre trace de méfait, je peux accomplir un rituel de purification. Agenouillez-vous et buvez ceci, {n}dit-il en vous tendant une flasque.{/n} Jusqu'à la dernière goutte. »
languages.original_text: "Are you confessing your transgressions before the Lord Inquisitor and seeking to repent? That is brave. As I said, all you have to do to redeem yourself is to take Eufrates II. But if you truly do repent of your deeds and seek to wash away the stain they have left upon your soul, I can perform a rite of purification. Bend your knee and drink this." {n}The Lord Inquisitor holds out a flask to you.{/n} "All of it."

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi, vous confessez vos transgressions au seigneur inquisiteur et cherchez à vous repentir ? Vous ne manquez pas de courage. Comme je vous l'ai déjà dit, tout ce que vous avez à faire pour expier vos fautes, c'est vous rendre sur Euphrate-II. Cependant, si vous souhaitez véritablement purger votre âme de la moindre trace de méfait, je peux accomplir un rituel de purification. Agenouillez-vous et buvez ceci, {n}dit-il en vous tendant une flasque.{/n} Jusqu'à la dernière goutte. »

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun huzurunda suçlarını itiraf edip tövbe mi edeceksin yani? Cesaretin takdire şayan. Dediğim gibi, kendini affettirmek istiyorsan Eufrates II'yi alacaksın. Ancak sahiden tövbe edip günahlarının ruhunda bıraktığı lekeleri temizlemek istiyorsan arınma ayini gerçekleştirebilirim. Diz çöküp bundan içeceksin." {n}Lord Engizisyoncu sana bir şişe uzatıyor.{/n} "Hepsini."
languages.original_text: "Are you confessing your transgressions before the Lord Inquisitor and seeking to repent? That is brave. As I said, all you have to do to redeem yourself is to take Eufrates II. But if you truly do repent of your deeds and seek to wash away the stain they have left upon your soul, I can perform a rite of purification. Bend your knee and drink this." {n}The Lord Inquisitor holds out a flask to you.{/n} "All of it."
